text: The Fringe Dwellers is a 1961 novel written by the Western Australian author Nene Gare.Nene Gare, The Fringe Dwellers, Sun Books, Melbourne, 1966 (first published by Heinemann, London, 1961). It was made into a 1986 film of the same name directed by Bruce Beresford. ==References== Category:Australian novels adapted into films Category:1961 Australian novels
title: The Fringe Dwellers (novel)
